```{r}

#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(dplyr)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(knitr)
```

```{r}
#get the dataset
url <-
  paste0(
    "http://data.insideairbnb.com/france/ile-de-france/",
    "paris/2023-12-12/data/listings.csv.gz"
  )

airbnb_data <-
  read_csv(
    file = url,
    guess_max = 20000
  )

write_csv(airbnb_data, "airbnb_data.csv")

airbnb_data
```
